alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:36PM MST until March 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains between 8500 And 11000 Feet, the Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains between 7500 and 11000 Feet and the Wet Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
